attributes.action: Bring a permanent ice rink to Leicester
attributes.additional_details: An ice rink in Leicester would give people something to do instead of potentially causing trouble and being antisocial. There are places that do rollerskating so why not ice skating. There isn’t enough to do in the city, an ice rink would benefit the city in many ways. There are plenty of areas to build one, and there are too many pointless things that have a fortune spent on.. its time something worthwhile was given to us.
attributes.background: Leicester doesn’t have many attractions at all compared to other cities. The Christmas ice rink does well, I think it’s about time a permanent one was brought to the city. It’d be a great place to keep fit and meet new people and make new friends, I would also love to learn and skate regularly.

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of Leicester City Council. You could petition Leicester City Council about bringing a permanent ice rink to Leicester:

https://www.leicester.gov.uk/your-council/decisions-meetings-and-minutes/presenting-a-petition/
